channel.title: Need help! cant find answer anywhere - change shop currency 718/742
channel.description:
hi guys sorry to take up your time but i am running rune-evo and its working fine, although there is a shop that uses "fist of guthix" tokens as it's currency, ive been searching almost every file for hours trying to find where to change this to coins. i have changed the item prices but cannot change the currency, could somebody please put my mind at ease and assist.
thank you

item.title: Need help! cant find answer anywhere - change shop currency 718/742
item.dc:creator: @Nashacus Nashacus
item.description:
@Nashacus wrote:

Not sure if you have found out yet but go into your source then data/items and there should a file called unpacked shops, when you open that the second column in will be the currency, the majority of them will be 995 just find the shop that the currency is fist of guthix tokens and change it to 995.
Once you have done that save and close then delete the file unpackedshops.s and that it.
You can compile and should be all working

Hope this helped.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help! cant find answer anywhere - change shop currency 718/742
